comment.author: 30085166@N00
comment._content: George Morley Young (1870-1932), served North Dakota in the U.S. House of Representatives from 1913 to 1924. Biographical Directory of the U.S. Congress.

comment.author: 8623220@N02
comment._content: Thanks for the additional identifying information.  Though the Biographical Directory of the U.S. Congress doesn't include a photo, we found a match in one of our collections that isn't digitized.  We'll add to our source data and reload the description to Flickr.
